name: Shopping Simulator 2018 Mega-Deluxe Edition
description:
Submitted for Ludum Dare 42 - Theme: 'Running out of Space'

By some stroke of luck, you have been afforded the shopping spree of a lifetime, at none other than the illustrious Sale-Mart! Sale-Mart, where the deals are great, the products are large, and you'll be running out of space in your wallet with all the savings! The only catch is: you only keep everything if you complete your shopping list, anything you scan past that is extra savings!

Sale-Mart has also been so gracious as to leave you a top of the line, vintage (and slightly rickety) cart to haul around your savings! There may not be much room in it, but nobody said you couldn't make multiple trips!

Current build has a hard coded 5 minute timer and gives you a random shopping list to complete. Scan objects at self-checkout in order to remove the item from your shopping list.

See if you can actually complete the round! If you can, leave a comment!

Special Thanks and Credits

- Quill18 and Tim Ruswick for providing entertainment on Twitch while slogging through development

- Bit Orchestra (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfvVKAi3oNbXUPe_KUTRX8Q) for the royalty free store music
